function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lingering psychological consequences of the COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Long-term impact on current generations","Mitigation":"Research on psychological consequences and implementation of appropriate interventions","Technologies":"Psychological research methods and intervention strategies","People":"Current generations","Owner":"Psychologists and healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Inability to accurately predict changes associated with energy-relevant outcomes","Impact":"Uncertainty in assessing the effects of changes","Mitigation":"Utilization of standardized approaches and validated scales, inclusion of additional measures","Technologies":"Standardized survey tools and validated measurement scales","People":"Research and survey respondents","Owner":"Researchers and survey administrators"},{"Description":"Impact on research design, sample selection, and data collection due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Implications for validity of research findings","Mitigation":"Consideration of pandemic effects on research design, sample selection, and data collection methodology","Technologies":"Adaptation of research methodologies to account for pandemic effects","People":"Researchers, survey administrators","Owner":"Research institutions and survey organizations"}]}
